sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Cool Cities Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Cool Cities Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:

sections.heading: State assistance to local greenhouse gas reduction initiatives
sections.text: The Environmental Protection Agency shall provide technical assistance, if needed, to units of local government in the State that have endorsed the U.S. Conference of Mayors Climate Protection Agreement. Upon request by a unit of local

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
